strapiPost.title: Levels of Success
strapiPost.content:
After the Supreme Court verdict this past summer in Alston vs. NCAA, student athletes are no longer limited on the education benefits they can receive. Which means, athletes can get paid for doing well in school. 

  • Localized: As of an announcement yesterday (Sept. 23), Razorback athletes “may receive money for their academic success” as a part of The Razorback Academic Success Initiative. 
  • Holistic success: The initiative ramps up more than ever the incentive for advancement toward a degree, as the University of Arkansas athletic department is invested in the education of its student athletes. 

Read the full announcement for more details HERE.
